data.text:
Overview

Wipro Global IT Business delivers winning business outcomes through its deep industry experience and a 360 degree view of "Business through Technology" - helping clients create successful and adaptive businesses. A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, a practitioner's approach to delivering innovation and an organization wide commitment to sustainability, Wipro Technologies has over 130,000 employees and clients across 54 countries. Wipro has a well established GIS practice helping customer manage, maintain and integrate their spatial information in order to better understand as well as make better operational or strategical decisions.

Services

Overview:

At Wipro, we envisage GIS as a strong Decision Support System being utilized for strategic planning, streamlining of business systems and efficient troubleshooting. The advantage of visual information management greatly changes that way enterprises can geographically map customer analytics and plan for new retail stores, warehouses, manufacturing plants or network assets in wide range of industries. Wipro brings its vast experience in core GIS technologies with services spanning across Consulting, Enterprise GIS application development, transformation (Integration, Migration & Upgrade) & Maintenance. Apart from mainstream business application we also invest in upcoming and future technologies like field mobility and augmented reality

Services Provided:

Application Development, Business Case Development, Data Conversion/Migration, Data Model & Database Design, GIS Strategy and Planning, Implementation, Needs and Requirements, System Architecture and Design, System Integration
